Resumo:
O Dead By Daylight trata-se de um jogo de coopera√ß√£o multiplayer, no qual em uma partida h√° 4 sobreviventes e 1 assassino, todos controlados por jogadores reais. Assim, cada classe tem objetivos e estrat√©gias diferentes. No entanto, abre-se a oportunidade de explora√ß√£o da jogabilidade proveniente da comunidade t√≥xica. Tamb√©m √© importante ressaltar que, seu personagem pode ser melhorado por meio de "bloodpoints", pontos obtidos por cada partida ou desafios conclu√≠dos. O problema √© que para praticamente maximizar ou "zerar" o jogo exige muitas e muitas horas de jogatina e dedica√ß√£o, j√° que normalmente √© preciso em torno de 5000 horas para atingir isso! √â isso mesmo, cinco mil horas, quase um ano jogando o jogo sem parar! Apesar de tudo √© um √≥timo jogo para jogar com amigos e passar muito estresse com killerS tunelladores e camperadores.

I'm a fairly new player with only 65 hours but after a load of painful matches on killer and survivor its really difficult to recommend this game. The game is just unfun. The balancing changes that Behaviour make are just questionable. The fifteen minute que times already prove that the game is dying. It's no wonder so many content creators have stopped playing this game. The game can be fun for an hour when playing with friends but from there it's just a descent into madness. 

Behaviour is completely unaware of what the players want and made the game a nightmare to play. The game is full of toxic players, cheaters, awful matchmaking and the new mmr system is just terrible. It sucks that I spent money on the game and right after Behaviour shows how scummy they truly are by actively endorsing the destruction of the environment by supporting nfts. I wish I could take back every cent I spent on this game.

If you enjoy the game that's great but to anyone considering buying this game please do not. It's not worth your time. Maybe in ten thousand years behavior will realize how bad the game has become but until then I'm not touching this game.
Got multiple friends hooked on this game throughout the years. Still fun to come back to, but could use better events and matchmaking. Hope the devs keep improving.
Frustrating, broken, irritating, toxic and still manages to be fun.
Somehow, out of all the games I have ever played, or even touched, this is the only one that has left me with a mix of ambivalence.
